dct_alternative_sm: Panoramic view of Mt. Clemens: Macomb Co. Michigan, looking Northwest.
dct_description_sm: North is oriented to upper right corner of the map.
Four vignettes along bottom of map, include Avery House, Palace Pharmacy, Sherman House, and Central Park house.

Bird's eyes view includes index of hotels, manufacturies, livery stables, news papers [sic], churches, professionals, and business references throughout the city. Also includes names of streets on the map.
A short history of Mt. Clemens and the reasons for its rapid growth is found under the index.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
